cls_maker[source]

cls_maker(nn_model_maker, solver_kwargs)

Wraps the construction of the cls_jax method.

Args: nn_model_maker: Function that returns a Model object using the nn parameters.

Returns: cls_jax: A callable function that takes the parameters of the observable as argument, and returns an expected CLs value from testing the background-only model against the nominal signal hypothesis (or whatever the value of 'test_mu' is)
